Question: Solos Technology Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Solos Technology Limited

AirGo3 Smart Glasses

- Expanded SolosTranslate feature for multilingual group communications in real-time, using OpenAI
- New operating modes include Listen, Group, Text, and Present for different communication scenarios
- Built on Solos’ proprietary software platform and OpenAI’s ChatGPT for effective live translation
- Whisper Technology for speech recognition and playback in noisy environments
- Powered by conversational AI through ChatGPT and Smart Hinge technology for prescription lenses and interchangeable front frame styles
- Available in three versions with pricing ranging from US$199 to US$299; prescription lenses are extra
